name: Travelers of the Vined Refuge
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Travelers of the Vined Refuge are known for their near-fanatical devotion to becoming one with nature. Now equipped with detailed knowledge of all the birds across Kharth, and the ability to communicate with them, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
